publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2663 Mr Mark Ruskell: Penalisation of Cyclingâ€”That the Parliament condemns the decision by NHS Tayside to introduce cycle parking charges for staff members commuting from Fife and the wider Dundee area to Ninewells Hospital; notes that the cost of construction and maintenance of an individual car parking space is far in excess of the cost of a secure cycle parking space, and believes that the development of a vibrant cycle culture in Scotland that is capable of improving both public health and the environment requires giving incentives to cycle commuting, not penalising it.

S2M-2663 Penalisation of Cycling (lodged on 24 March 2005) Tommy Sheridan*, Chris Ballance*, Shiona Baird*, Frances Curran*, Rob Gibson*, Carolyn Leckie*, Nora Radcliffe*, Dr Jean Turner*, Mark Ballard*, Mr John Swinney*, Patrick Harvie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2663 Penalisation of Cycling (lodged on 24 March 2005) Robin Harper*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-2663 Penalisation of Cycling (lodged on 24 March 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2663 Penalisation of Cycling (lodged on 24 March 2005) Robert Brown*
